# Privacy Guard Test Data - Clean Samples (No PII)
# Purpose: Baseline text that should NOT trigger any PII detections
# Expected: Zero detections on all lines
# Format: Plain text, normal business/technical content
# Date: 2025-11-03

# === TECHNICAL DOCUMENTATION ===
The system architecture consists of three main components.
Database configuration requires setting the connection pool size.
API endpoints are documented in the OpenAPI specification.
The deployment process uses Docker Compose for container orchestration.
Performance benchmarks show P50 latency under 100ms.

# === BUSINESS COMMUNICATION ===
Please review the quarterly report by end of week.
The project timeline includes three phases over six months.
Budget approval is pending from the finance department.
Team meeting scheduled for next Tuesday at 2pm.
The proposal outlines five key deliverables.

# === PRODUCT DESCRIPTIONS ===
This software provides real-time data analytics capabilities.
The user interface features a responsive design for mobile devices.
Integration with third-party services is supported via webhooks.
The premium plan includes priority support and advanced features.
Pricing starts at fifty dollars per month per user.

# === TECHNICAL LOGS ===
Application started successfully on port 8080.
Database connection pool initialized with 10 connections.
Cache hit ratio: 87 percent over last hour.
Request processed in 45 milliseconds.
Memory usage: 512 MB of 2048 MB allocated.

# === CODE SNIPPETS (GENERIC) ===
The function returns a boolean value indicating success.
Variable names should use snake_case convention.
Import the logging module at the top of the file.
The loop iterates over each element in the array.
Error handling uses try-catch blocks for exceptions.

# === GENERIC NUMBERS (NOT PII) ===
The order quantity is 1500 units.
Product SKU: PROD-2024-001
Reference number: REF-ABC-123
Invoice total: 2500.00
Version 2.4.1 includes bug fixes.

# === DATES (NOT BIRTHDATES) ===
The project started in January 2024.
Deadline is December 15, 2024.
Meeting scheduled for 2024-11-20.
Release planned for Q1 2025.
Historical data from 2020 to 2023.

# === GENERIC ADDRESSES (NOT SPECIFIC) ===
The office is located downtown.
Shipping to the east coast region.
Warehouse in the midwest facility.
Conference venue is near the airport.
Store hours: Monday through Friday, 9am to 5pm.

# === MEASUREMENTS AND METRICS ===
The server response time averages 150 milliseconds.
File size is approximately 2.5 megabytes.
Network throughput reached 100 megabits per second.
Storage capacity is 500 gigabytes.
CPU utilization peaked at 75 percent.

# === GENERIC NAMES (BRANDS, NOT PEOPLE) ===
The tool supports integration with Slack and Teams.
Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux.
Built using React and Node.js frameworks.
Hosted on Amazon Web Services infrastructure.
Monitoring via Datadog and New Relic.

# === TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS ===
Supports OAuth 2.0 authentication flow.
Data encrypted using AES-256 encryption.
Backup retention policy: 30 days rolling window.
API rate limit: 1000 requests per hour.
Session timeout: 30 minutes of inactivity.

# === ERROR MESSAGES (GENERIC) ===
Error: Connection timeout after 30 seconds.
Warning: Cache size exceeds recommended threshold.
Info: Configuration loaded successfully.
Debug: Processing item 42 of 100.
Notice: Scheduled maintenance window this weekend.

# === GENERIC CONVERSATIONS ===
Thanks for the update on the project status.
Could you clarify the requirements for the new feature?
The documentation needs to be updated accordingly.
Let's schedule a follow-up meeting next week.
Great work on the presentation yesterday.

# === SYSTEM STATUS MESSAGES ===
All systems operational.
Service health check passed.
Database migration completed successfully.
Backup job finished at 2am.
Certificate renewal scheduled for next month.

# === PRODUCT FEATURES ===
Supports real-time collaboration.
Includes automated reporting capabilities.
Provides customizable dashboard layouts.
Offers role-based access control.
Features integrated search functionality.

# === POLICY STATEMENTS (GENERIC) ===
All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
Access logs are retained for compliance purposes.
Regular security audits are conducted quarterly.
Users must agree to terms of service.
Passwords must be at least eight characters long.

# === NUMBERS THAT LOOK LIKE PATTERNS BUT AREN'T PII ===
Product code: 123-456-789 (similar to SSN format but clearly product code)
Serial number: 4532-1234-ABCD-9999 (similar to card but has letters)
Tracking ID: 555-ABC-1234 (similar to phone but has letters)
Reference: 192-168-001-100 (similar to IP but has leading zeros and hyphens)

# === COMMON FALSE POSITIVE CANDIDATES ===
Version 1.2.3.4 (looks like IPv4 but is version number)
Date range: 01/01/2020 to 12/31/2024 (dates without birth context)
Time: 12:34:56 (colon-separated numbers)
Coordinate: 37.7749, -122.4194 (GPS coordinates, not phone)
Aspect ratio: 16:9 display resolution

# === BUSINESS METRICS ===
Customer satisfaction score: 4.5 out of 5.
Monthly recurring revenue increased by 15 percent.
User retention rate: 92 percent.
Average order value: 125 dollars.
Conversion rate improved to 3.2 percent.

# === GENERIC TITLES (NO NAMES) ===
The director approved the budget.
The engineer implemented the feature.
The manager scheduled the review.
The analyst prepared the report.
The coordinator organized the event.

# === TECHNICAL OPERATIONS ===
Deployment completed without errors.
Rollback procedure documented in runbook.
Load balancer distributes traffic across three servers.
CDN cache invalidation takes approximately 5 minutes.
SSL certificate valid until next year.

# === MIXED CONTENT (NO PII) ===
The Q4 roadmap includes five major features launching between October and December, targeting enterprise customers in the healthcare vertical with compliance requirements for HIPAA and SOC2.

System requirements: minimum 8GB RAM, 100GB storage, quad-core processor, operating system must be updated to latest version, network connectivity required for cloud features.

The application processes up to ten thousand transactions per day with average latency under 200 milliseconds and 99.9 percent uptime measured over the last six months.

# === END OF CLEAN SAMPLES ===

# Expected PII detections: 0
# Purpose: Validate that guard does not generate false positives on normal text
